I know of all the ones on Amazon, but does anyone have any actual experience with one? This would be the normal ball and socket mount on most Garmin GPS units. It’s going on an ‘04 VTX 1300 so it would most likely have to be a handlebar mount.

I got one of the most expensive Garmin GPSs available last year for dirt cheap because my aunt was pretty high up in the company but she’s retired now so I don’t want to lose this one.
